title: Pre-Colonoscopy Bowel Preparation Education: Mobile App-Based Training Program

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Environment for systematically learning meal preparation procedures through mobile apps and real-time online classes. Provides smartphone-optimized content for learners without PCs

learning_goals: Learners can explain the purpose and procedures of bowel preparation before a colonoscopy
Learners can use a mobile app to develop and implement personalized bowel preparation plans
Learners can understand the BBPS assessment criteria and self-evaluate bowel preparation quality

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
